title: 3MCT: Cereal
description: Voicemails of concern pour in for Travis after Ohio State lost to 15-seed Oral Roberts. Then the gang shares middle school horror stories before diving into this weeks bracket: CEREAL! The union is proud of how this one turned out (52:18). And finally: the moment you knew you were getting old. (2:05:00)
itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
itunes:subtitle: The Union fills out another bracket, this week it's cereal
